values:
helo0o0o0o la la la  -- lol -- good nite.. went lots of places (sarahs, skatium, steveos) we watched napoleon dynamite (again lol) and i love it more everytime i watch it (lol even though i fell asleep watchin it) -- then steveos friends came over and all that jazz -- and now im listening to "Mr. Brightside" by the killers again -- i discovered the song last nite and am now obsessed (hehe) and i got sarah d into it (the video is soo moulin rouge) and makes me very happy -- its sooo good! o0o0o and dallas just said they're singing on SNL (sweeet) lol -- gotta get up early for work but im watchin it -- so nite nite* :) 


"You don't like raisins?"
"....Well they taste sweet but really they're just humiliated grapes"
                - Benny & Joon -

hey hey -- im gettin so excited for prom (mainly cause debby sent me a picture of a dress she wants and got me thinking about it) but it's in april lol -- so it seems like i have time but i really dont want to leave it all to the last minute (which is so like me) anyway -- i got my car back today cause dad finally got his fixed.. so no more bus (wooo hoo) anyway - not much else to write about but it was just a goooood day :) lol love to all ;)

helo0o0o -- it has to be said that me, julie, and kat had the best weekends (lol) any way.. my cousin just emailed me and told me the dress im gonna wear in her wedding (im soo excited i've never been in a wedding before) its on july 4th weekend and i cant wait

http://www.davidsbridal.com/bridesmaids_bycolor_detail.jsp?stid=1353&sid=5153&cfid=10

Thats the link to see the dress -- all the girls should go to it and tell me what you think :) im soooo excited -- yay!!! anyway love to all mwah xox

o0o ps - i have the best sister in the world :)

emokidsdepressme: i love brittany lynn scott more than anyone's mom!


now THAT'S love! -- haha thanks for the party jules and to everyone who came.. i love you all so very much -- thanks for making a memorable birthday :)

i took pics on my new camera..so hopefully i'll start using myspace and u can all see them -- mwah! nite*

ahh! amazing birthday -- and i guess i'll describe it cause i have time.. first school was awesome (its always the best day because everyone hugs you lol) then steve and me went to applebees (gooooood time :) - he's the best) then we went to the charity show (very hard to find but better once we got there) and like everyone from school was there (it was great to see everyone) highlight of the night - trish surprised me and got them to announce my birthday (yay!!! thanks trish) and it was just a fun night.. really really great birthday :) -- anywho the fun continues tonite cause we have a party @ julies - then -- next weekend i want steveo to have a shindig (everyones gotta help me convince him) -- oh oh and today i worked (which was actually fun today) and i got my new glasses (they're so hot) -- anyway gonna go get ready -- love to all mwah!!!!


OHHH THANKS TO EVERYONE WHO PUT BIRTHDAY WISHES IN THEIR JOURNAL ENTRIES -- I LOVE YOU GUYS
OHHH AND I GOT A DIGITAL CAMEREA FOR MY BIRTHDAY YAY!

My birthday is tomorrow ladies!!! im soo excited - its seriously the best day of the year.. the party is at julies but we may have another steveo shindig for all the people who cant come... i dunno but we'll figure it out -- i dont kno exactly what im doing tomorrow either. steven's taking me out to dinner (yay) but then i dont kno where we're going (maybe charity cause theres a crap load of people going) who knows -- im just happy its my birthday :) mwah!

haha -- as you can see im bad at updates.. w/e not that much is going on :) cept my birthday is friday :) yay -- thats all im really excited about rite now :) that and the shore trips -- but we'll talk about that later.. rite now i just wanted to update -- and now im done mwah *

oh oh -- the party - i dont kno if its gonna be friday or saturday or at sarahs or at julies -- but i'll keep you all updated lol :)

ok!!! i haven't updated in a bitchin long time.. since before school started.. so school started big deal -- the big news is I GOT MY LICENSE TODAY! so it was only fitting that i update and let everyone kno!!! love u all -- if u want a ride i need gas money (not all the time..) haha im soo friggin excited.. im gonna ask steveo if we can have a celebration shindig for me :) haha love u all!!!

ashley's all set up *im excited for her.. she'll do great :) and her dorm look soooooooo adorable :)

here's my roster :)

1:: Theo - Spires
2:: Eng - Miles
3:: AP Chem - Kelch
4:: LUNCH
5:: AP Hist - Sr. Lucy
6:: Spanish - Budiwsky
7:: Pre-Calc - Quinn (haha i love him)
8:: Basic Accounting - Robinson

I'm pretty happy w/ it -- lemme know if we have anything together :)

Ashley is leavin tomorrow (well today actually) * i know i wrote so much crap about her leavin in this journal.. but i guess it was my way of "dealing" with it -- maybe i thought this moment wouldnt really come.. its kind of surreal.. i mean i kno she'll be back for Christmas before i kno it.. then she gets out around April (lucky jerk) but.. still its soo weird to think i'll be sittin at home and she wont just be out, she'll be living somewhere else. seeing other people and doing other things without me.. i wont expect her home anymore -- maybe im just gettin too emotional, and making a bigger deal of this then it is.. its just strange to think she wont be here when i come home, she wont be here watching real world with me (lol) she wont come out to dinner on a family nite.. she just wont.. lol im gettin a little teary eyed (i gotta stop watching tearjerker movies :)) lol -- but anyway i'll be gone till saturday (so everyone call me up that nite.. im gonna need a party lol) nite nite* cya all soon... love ;)

man! i am in a whirlwind -- on a natural high.. im lovin these rehearsals for JCS -- soo much fun and i havent had that much fun @ rehearsals since Chicago lol -- its just a good time i get to act like a whore (which is soo not me but i love acting haha) and the songs are soo fun and the dancing is gorgeous -- jsut fun.. and like i told kat i'm lettin go finally and moving on finally which is something i just have to do cause if i dont i'll go nuts... so i'm lettin go and relaxing more and letting things take its course -- if ur not me or kat you may not understand but its cool.. just kno i'm lettin gooooo bitch :) -- so anyway i'm havin a party tomorrow (i think ;) chell) and hopefully daddy will let me out cause he's thinkin of not... then we have to suffer through a like 5 hour drive to Pitt -- but i love Pitt soo its cool and we get to decorate ashley's room!! woo hoo -- so anyway im gonna go love to all :)

oh oh and my grand slam was supposed to be w/ bacon!

Kathleen is back! aww that makes me happy * i missed her crazy* anyway we had a going away party for ashley last nite -- it was bitter sweet cause we had such a GOOOOOOOOOOOD time (chillin to sinatra) but then again she's gone man.. gone.. and i'm goin w/ her! lol well @ least for the first few days i get to help her w/ her room setup and stuff and  i get to meet her roomate * so it'll be cool -- anyway tonite i chilled w/ chell @ nancy's (after a lot of confusion on where the hell she was haha) then we went for a gorgeous walk and to her house to chill some more w/ chips, teddy grahms, and the soundtrack to russ's show (goooooood times) then we chilled in the lebaron ( haha a lot of chillin) and i encourage her and mrs. fellman to throw a party on tuesday (the only day i'm available then i leave for Pitt) hmmmmm a party would be funnnnnnnn ::wink, wink:: haha i dont have to wink though its clear i want one :) mwhahaha! anywho.... i'm gonnnnnnnnna go :) 

P.S. -- "My grand slam was supposed to be with bacon!!!"

lmao!!! nite nite!!!!

well i disappeared :) haha and it was a great time -- it happend on saturday (after russ's AMAZING SHOW!!!) i just went to lunch w/ mom and dad then went to work -- then sunday was all w/ kay to a show then to dinner then to the read thru for JCS (Jesus Christ Superstar) it felt sooooo good to be w/ those people again :) it was just a good time :) then monday i chilled and had our first dance rehearsal -- Oh soo much fun!! i'm soo excited about it and i havent been excited about something in a long time... lol it feels soo good.. especially cause i get to meet more new people which i love -- but anyway i dont have that much to write (even though i've been gone for like 3 days) im just happy :) except ashley is leavin in about a week.. how scary is that? its kinda exciting though.. cause its new.. just like when i move to New York :) haha maybe i will maybe i wont -- i dont kno yet... anyway love ya!

hello ladies* haha i could not get to bed last nite cause ashley had her friends over till like 3 in the morning* i was soo pissed cause they were sooo loud -- anyway i finally got to bed but got woken up by the doorbell and the phone ringing haha i went up to answer the door (it was 11 am and i had no idea who the hell it would be) turns out we got a lovely surprise :) my cousin gabby!! i love that little chick - haha aunt gwen brought the kids to ridley for the day and me and gabby got to chill -- i love that little girl :) haha then i had work @ 3:30 - such a good time -- there was like no one there so we just listened to music and threw swedish fish @ each other (i love working thursday nites)and this kid kevin who works there came in to show us his tattoo (omg it looks soo good) but i gotta work tomorrow (friday mornings suck) but then!!! i get to see russ's show! i'm sooooo excited i cant wait :) cause then the party is saturday annnnnnd i will prob be able to sleepover (hehehe) annnnnd then i'm spending allll of sunday w/ kay -- hopefully its as great a weekend as it sounds - haha - i'm gonna watch celebrity poker then be back later -- mwah xox

hey hey hey * i havent written in here since like saturday - but anyway nothing exciting has really happend cause everyone is like down the shore.. but sunday night i just stayed in and finished up my chem and history (blah) then monday i got my hair done (soooo cute) hehe and i stayed in w/ ashley and watched movies :) haha we're adorable then last nite i went and chilled over chells for a bit -- i went out back to talk to mrs fellman and kev sang his new song for us (which i love) and he was singing that beatles song blackbird (which i love) then dad came @ 10:30 and i couldnt find chell to say goodbye (i'm sorry) :( -- oh i forgot.. yesterday me and dad went to the Y for the first time -- i got my photo taken for my membership card -- i really like it there with all the machines and stuff -- i feel "fit" when i'm there hahaha-- they have a pool and everything, but now i need a really nice radio that i can listen to when i'm "gettin buff" haha -- i'm gonna go dry my hair and stuff - later ladies :)

aww man tonite rocked* i got to chells @ 7:30 and they pratically threw me in the car (it was a jack chell! a jack OH MY GOD) haha -- anyway we went to eb games in a very scary car ride with lots of screaming boys and very loud jazz music (mwhaha) then we went to tom jones (my most favorite eating establishment of all time) and dave got yelled @ -- and wilcox had something on his face -- then we went glow bowling!!! soo much fun (my third time bowling this week) i'm still not good but i love it :)hehe after everything me and chell and rachel (and even russ!) would dance with the gay music blasting -- dancing in the alleys bitch -- such a great time* haha and then i went out to get a drink for me and chell and rite outside was zavorski.. just standing out there so i went to say hello * haha and so did chell :) (haha love u chell) then chell's bff called and i said goodbye to steven michael -- then we went inside and me and chell got married like jewish people -- then we took a crazy car ride home (after quoting anchorman of course) it was a gooooooooood time! and i am terrified to go to work tomorrow* i have to work from 10-6!!! 8 hours -- i'm gonna die :( oh well people have to come visit -- and i'll make lots of money :) yay!!! so anywho i love u all  nite nite*

heyy -- that subject is the line from a bruce song thats in big daddy - it took me forever to find the lyrics but i did :) -- so yesterday i went to lunch w/ steveo @ nifty fifties so i could say goodbye before he leaves.. we had such a good time (we're soo cute) and then we went back and i helped his mom out w/ chores (lol) then steve came by and steveo invited us back over that nite (after him and teri had an adorable dinner) lol so i went rite out to dinner w/ my mom and dad (we were singin in the car and everything - i loved it) then i just went straight to steveos and debby and steve came up and we went bowling (again) i'm starting to really like it (even though i'm not that good) anyway we all had a good time and were tellin jokes on the porch when we got back :)then i had to say goodbye to steveo and debby (but they'll be back before u kno it) -- i had fun but i miss chell fellman (i'm soo chillin w/ her tonite if she wants) and i wanna meet her cousin (who i've heard so much about) plus i gotta get my piece of the love tube (RIP) oh oh - and we just got new furniture (soooooo comfy! i love it!!!) anyway i'm gonna watch some movies then i have work -- later lovers!

hey hey hey -- today was relaxing i just spent the morning talkin w/ kat and stuff then @ 12:45 i waited for my driving lesson and my mom and sis waited w/ me -- we talked forever about just different stuff and before we knew it it was 1:30 and the guy still wasnt there -- so mom called and he had crossed my name off the list by accident (and i had work @ 3:30 so he couldnt come late) so now i have to wait until tuesday for my last lesson -- i wanted to get it over w/! jerkface -- anyway the man ruined the tube (see chell's journal for more details :( its very upsetting) then i went to work around 3:30 - great nite -- not too slow or too crowded it was just riiiite -- and i broke down a lot faster then i usually do :) i was proud of myself - then i came home and watched last comic standing w/ daddy :) and!! hocus pocus is on (notice the song choice for todays entry) -- ahhh i love that movie cause it reminds me of halloween :) haha i love love love it! -- oh oh! me and kay are gonna help @ peter pan on August 15 -- then we're goin to dinnner :) then we're goin to the read thru -- i'm sooooooo excited for this show and to see everyone -- they are the coolest people -- anyway ladies i must go -- later lovers! stay classy!

well i am utterly confused* sometimes i find myself knowing everything and sometimes i am left completely in the dark * but i'm loving writing in this journal rite now -- it reminds me of sex and the city (which i am starting to LOVE that show) but anyway back to confusion -- its a funny thing because u get little pieces of stories (and based on ur own experiences) you make conclusions -- now this is where it gets dangerous because if your conclusions are completely off then u could be faced w/ a big letdown (depending on the situation)or it could be better then u thought -- the point is get all ur info before u determine the outcome of whatever situation u are in :) -- wow i must be really tired to pull that outta my ass -- ok time to finish talkin and to watch boy meets world* -- later ladies*

haha -- steveo would like that subject very much! i went over tonite and i drove :) but debby almost HIT MY CAR!!! its ok kid i forgive u lol -- but anyway it was me, steveo, steve, debby, teri, and sarah came (yay i love her) so we went to wawa cause i needed candy and steveo, steve, and i carried purses (the boys looked pimp i had to say -- especially the pink one!) -- then we went back and waited for sarah (debby is an awesome piano player by the way)then we went bowling (only me, steveo, steve, and debster played) dude i did good too (well for me anyway) i got second! i believe steve got like 111 or something i got 76 steveo got a 60 something and debby (who was amazing) got a 50 something :) i was soo proud of my partner -- then we had to walk through the muddy dirty wet field and poor debster went swimming in it (it was steves fault -- he soo started it) then we went back and chilled -- it was a good time -- then i came home and told kat everything :) haha :) anyway ladies i must go watch tv :) boy meets world is gonna be on!!! yay!!! -- stay classy!

i'm tryin diffrent looks w/ my journal so today its purple lights -- i like it :) earlier i had a disney theme but it was too cluttered (haha) anyway i was talkin to kat today about how i feel things are changing.. and for the better - it just made me think of junior year.. then senior year.. then us all going in different directions * ashley's leavin is really making me think about college and it doesnt help when my dad asks "so where do u want to go" everyday.. lol but its soo exciting -- meeting new people is the best especially when ur bored.. and different from the kids u usually are with -- its cool * lol i'm kinda just rambling cause i'm tired but some of it makes sense to me... basically things are changing and thats a good thing* :) anyway ladies i must get ready for driving (i get my license soooon) then i'll take u all out for dinner (but u have to pay for urself.. oh and i want gas money) hahaha doesnt sound like fun but it will be --> bye bye -- stay classy*

p.s. -- me and kat are gonna marry rich doctors after we go into the witness protection program so we can meet new people

I saw anchorman!!!!! soo good i loveed it! soo very much (russ was rite and i'd go see it again) but lets back track i went to work and we played rummy (i lost bad) and... chell carm and bill came to see me!!! (yay the first ones to see me at work) i was soo excited but i couldnt entertain (hehe) but anyway then i came home then we went to anchorman and chell bought me jujyfruits!! so very fun then bill bought us tix (soo nice) and the dog lived!!! (yay i said he would) then bill drove us to pizza hut and bought us food (that was soo cool) then chell and carm went in the bathroom (what went on in there i'll never kno -- eww haha i joke of course) then i grabbed nilla wafers and crakers * then carm through a cookie at chell (that was soo funny) it was crazy and funn* i loved the movie -- now i'm home again and have to get up early for work (thats ok) its cool no problems (haha) anyway ladies goodnite and stay classssssy :)

I wanted to go out tonite.. but i didnt so i'm doing a survey: for your enjoyment!
Three things that scare me:
1:lonliness
2:death
3:the future
Three people who make me laugh:
1:kat
2:chell
3:teri/sarah/debby/meg/steveo... etc haha
Three Things I love:
1:my family
2:laughing
3:being successful
Three Things I hate:
1:lonely times
2:not being able to yell at people
3:not being able to understand
Three things I don't understand:
1:my friends
2:drama
3:relationships
Three things on my desk:
1:my glasses
2:a bruce springsteen cd
3:a mirror
Three things I'm doing right now:
1:watching tv
2:writing my name
3:reading people's infos
Three things I want to do before I die:
1:get married
2:get a great job
3:have a family
Three things I can do:
1:curl my tounge
2:quote every movie known to man
3:keep secrets
Three ways to describe my personality:
1:trustworthy
2:nice
3:caring/ worrysome
Three things I can't do:
1:sing
2:dance
3:sit and read an entire book

Three Things brought to you by BZOINK!

Hola! how is everyone this evening* i had a good day cause i worked and made money and got to leave early (that was really fun) then i was supposed to go to lunch w/ steveo but he had to clean for his shindig so i chilled here and got arbys (soooooo good) and watched boy meets world (wooohoooo love that show)then went to steveo's shindig (good times man) we had funn especially when i laughed so hard at steve's fat cat and snorted (hahaha love it) and i'm soo happy for my friends that are happy -- hehe oh darlings i did have a good time and i hope i'm allowed out tomorrow (kat your comin out no matter what you say) oh! maybe chell can take me cruisin in her LeBaron (hot sexy car when i get shotgun!!!) * heyy thanks for everyones advice by the way (you kno who you are) i mean i was really extremely confused on what i wanted before cause it was hard to find a good decision, and now it just seems soo clear, thanks again guys hehe i'm in a good mood now ladies so i'm gonna get something to eat... or... maybe watch tv .. i dunno but i'm def watchin boy meets world @ 12 baby!!!! later lovers (i love sarah dibello!!!)

OH GOODNESS!!!! when was the last time i looked at this thing... i was bored and thought i should get back into it ladies!!! a lot has happend this summer and its been amazing! -- the biggest thing was going to see incubus w/ chelly for her b-day.. the show was sooooooooo amazing (really kev almost started crying) haha -- it was really great (good experience) and that night rocked soo hard (jumpin on the trampoline till 5 in the morning... and other thngs as well haha) but anyway now i'm just working on chem and history everday chillin and working making money and finally having enough money to go out and buy some clothes for myself cause after ashley leaves.. thats it no more wearing her stuff (i'm gonna miss her like crazy) oh! i got back in touch with my friend kay (the one who drives! haha) and shes directing another show at barstormers (very exciting since i havent seen her in forever) and she wants me to be in it (i didnt even have to audition) its Jesus Christ Superstar -- im soo happy cause i get to see all my fave people again -- oh oh and i love kathleen shea forever (me and her are psychic and relationship twins!!!) oh oh and me+chell+fall out boy = mad chillin! haha and steveo baby i love sooooo much cause he helps me out (we're havin a lunch date tomorrow then he's having a shindig!) so anywho i'm very embarrased that i havent updated but thats all i got to say -- i will be back (i promise) love ya ladies!!!

Hello ladies -- what an amazing day! we are DONE our sophmore year.. we're gonna be friggina juniors next year, upper classman biotch haha -- i can not wait -- and actually the finals weren't that bad today* i mean english was hard but it didnt make me cry like i thought it would.. and math was multiple choice (hehe i love it) and i had a good time after school too (w/ kat, chell, naimoli, cashman, and matt haley) we had a good time, but ed and naimoli were throwing things at chell (not cool cause chell is gonna kick ed's ass) haha, but anywho i'm just chillin w/ my mom rite now, and tonite i'm goin to kev's graduation party thing w/ chell then i'm sleeping over.. we're gonna jam all nite (and maybe we can meet kat and leanne somewhere)it'll be a good time*kat i saw ur icon (LOVE IT!) i'm kinda bored rite now though and its only like 2 and i wanna go out-- and i have to work tomorrow (making money) but i get out at like 6 so i can still go to collenbrook (only if other people are going of course) -- aww now i'm talkin to my steveo (i adore him haha -- he's a working man too now) anywho darlings i'm gonna watch a movie or something.. later lovers!

I love kerri!!! she gave me an amazing cd that i can not stop listening to - its all my favorite songs baby* makes me very happy.. that and a few other things: this weekend makes me happy, the fact that i only have 2 more finals makes me happy, the summer coming makes me happy, junior year makes me happy, my license makes me happy, my family makes me happy, and i'm soo happy school is over biotch* haha  -- its just great to feel like everything is ok rite now (at this second) lol -- like im not so much worried about school anymore, i worked my butt off now i can have a little fun* hmm this cd makes me really happy -- lol makes me think of driving :) hehe i'm telling everyone now that i'll take u all out the night i get my license (if i'm allowed) but u have to pay for gas (there are no free rides ladies) haha i'm just soo happy * gotta stop saying that -- so anyway finals arent that hard (well spanish was but i'm not worried) and i kno english will be ridiculous cause thats just the way it is -- anyway girls its sooo hot up here in my room so i think i'll go down in the air conditioner -- later lovers!

Heloo ladies -- good day, good day! it was our last days of classes and summer parties are filling the air (hint hing meg and chell) aww man it'll be funn.. but anyway we were just in classes as a formality, just to sit there and say we were there* except for spanish class cause she had to explain the rest of her ridiculous exam, and english we had some worksheet to do.. but everywhere else we talked and stuff -- it was a good time* school is a lot more fun when u don't have to work :) and today was our last lunch -- we have some nice memories this year.. a lot more fun then last year (po-ta-toes!!!) haha --  i had fun w/ kat and anna and sarah and trish and meg -- it was a good year, stressful but good, and now its over :) hehe -- i feel all happy.. i should go driving * and i wanna pick up my pics soon :) hopefully i can get one to kat! haha -- now i want to go driving again -- i love it* makes me feel free haha, and next year i'll just be driving everyday! -- o0o to anyone who thinks they can get a ride from me to school next year ur wrong.. mom's not gonna let me -- sorry to disappoint -- anywho i want to take a nap soon :) later lovers!

oh goodness * haha i'm so tired and bored(but still happy for some reason)... i took like two naps and still have nothing to do * maybe i should be studying but i dont wanna.. lol i worked all year and i'm tired * now we got that INSANE summer work to do and it'll take up a lot of time.. plus i gotta read Malcolm X and two other books (and i'm not a big reader) oh well.. i better have fun * chell said we can have summer blow outs (haha i'm thinkin 4 or 5 -- whatever floats your boat) and chillin and relaxing almost everynight.. i need some rest man * hmm maybe i'll go driving -- i'm supposed to get my license on July 31, i really hope i do cause i am NOT taking the bus next year (no friggin way) i'm soo sick of gettin home at like 2:50 and dropping everyone off at their doorstep and being in that hott sticky bus w/ nothing to do -- it sucks -- so i'm determined to get my license.. then i can take the Maliboo (hehe) yeah biotch -- can't wait ::yawn:: man i am falling asleep here -- and i've been so lazy to update i just thought i type something real quick -- i cant believe the end of the year is soo close (yet feels soo far away) ughh -- question: if anyone wants to one day go to the movies after finals this week and maybe go to lunch another day lemme know cause i wanna lol -- k i'm gonna hopefully head to CVS and finally get my pics developed from the shore -- later lovers*

Full moons make people crazy... interesting developments appear, random remarks are said, people pop up unexpectedly, and drama never ceases to amaze me.. but like kat says "it keeps you busy" -- haha no one prob knows what i'm talkin about, but trust me -- this will be an interesting summer -- no doubt every summer is interesting.. but we're gonna be friggin juniors next year, and things are always dramatic in my group so it'll be very very.. interesting :) -- i cant wait -- haha.. anyway today me and ash did some sister bonding.. she took me to the mall and we went shopping (she's been real nice since she's leaving soon) but we had a good time :)tonight is my last night of training at work.. now i can finally work without someone watching me every five seconds -- it does get annoying.. hmm i'm soo deep in thought today.. im in a good mood, but also deep in thought -- ahh school is almost done! i cant stand it.. but ouch my sunburn is hurting again (its peeling a bit.. gross :( ) its goin away so its all good, but i'm still very confused -- anywho ladies have a good day :)

Yearbooks are all around now* it started yesterday when everyone got theirs, now its all around and i havent gotten one.. i didnt get one last year either* my mom says they're too expensive and the most important one is the senior one so i can get one then.. but its cool cause most of the time u just get people who are in ur classes to sign em and they always say something like "have a nice summer" or "we soo gotta keep in touch" i'm guilty of saying the same things.. and most of the time you don't see these people until september rolls around again.. so what happends in the senior yearbook? you really might never see some of these people again.. i was just wondering this while writing in yearbooks today (continuing w/ my revelation)* i decided to create a ghetto fabulous yearbook w/ 5 pieces of looseleaf, and since there isnt a lot of room anyone who really had something to say could write in it.. so kat was the first one* she wrote a page long dedication to this year and everything that happend between us and i realized that this is what will fill my head as i leave o'hara -- these page long dedication to everything that we'll go through... i mean we're friggin juniors next year.. last year we were freshmen * this is just hittin me that your time is short.. maybe i will miss o'hara more then i thought i would -- plus ashley told me she'll miss it too and i was like "what the hell??" she didnt think she would.. but she does... i dunno -- maybe i'm just tired lol and i have work tonite (grr) oh well please leave your thoughts biotches :)*

haha -- i have no clue why i put that as my title.. i just love that movie (lol) anyway i have three days to cover in this because i've been soo tired i havent even turned on my computer

Saturday: we had the party for my sister.. it was an amazing time but i was soo beat afterwards -- i did like all the decorating, entertaining, dancing w/ the little kids, playing w/ the little kids, chasing after the little kids, plus i had to clean up at the end and i couldnt go out after it so i was mad.. then ash is allowed out.. that really sucked -- but we got some goooood food from it (*roast beef, meatballs, chicken, lots of snacks, and cookies*) so i guess it was ok.. i was just tired

Sunday: Megs party!! we had a great time playin little kiddie games like twister and whisper down the lane (haha yes!) oh oh and we soo sang karaokee.. that was a good time -- then i actually managed to stay dry as the girls had a water/cake fight.. funny to watch but i didnt wanna join in :) -- we scared meg out of her mind to the point where she couldnt breathe -- haha she wasnt expecting anything :) (hehe sneaky)

Monday: wicked hott in school.. ridiculously hott and i could not concentrate at all* im sooooo ready to get out.. everything feels like a formality now -- like we're just showing up and going up.. but it feels like it will never end -- omg i cant wait for this weekend i just cant wait.. i need a vacation bad!

and its way to hott up here for me to write more :) i'm goin down in the air conditioner biotches! love you!

hello ladies! i didn't write yesterday cause i came home and crashed, then i went shoppin, then i had work :) i really like my job -- yupp i was working yesterday and its not as hard as i thought it would be, the only hard part is dealing w/ impacient people -- yupp i got a mean guy yesterday, but its cool.. i just blew it off -- i get to work w/ lunch meat too which means i can take a piece whenever i want :) i love lunch meat.. and pickles (OOHH YEAH) lol -- anywho after work i went to chell's for a party (it was a party for shitbrick.. colleen!) lol -- we had a great time (it was me, chell, coll, mike, steveo, and kerri) we chilled in the pool and ate donuts for colleen's appreciation day -- it was fun, but when i got home i fell rite asleep... ugh and i had to get up early today cause i have to help my mom -- we're havin ashley's graduation party.. aww man its gonna be such a good time -- like my whole family will be there (thats a lot of people) and its gonna be good food and a great dj -- yeah baby! it's takin up my whole day though.. oh well -- lol my mom is sooo nervous that it won't turn out ok.. so i have to calm her down hehe -- i gotta go get ready now.. i'll prob write later on how it went -- love ya biotches!!

hello ladies* today was really nice.. gorgeous weather and school was bearable -- the mass was really nice cause the choir sang one of my favorite songs "You Raise Me Up" -- it was really good :) and me and kat had a good time at mass, hehe -- and in bio we watched presentations -- man anna did an amazing job.. she is the coolest chica i love her.. gym sucked (oh well) but then in history we finished watching Shrek and i heard another one of my favorite songs "Hallelujah" -- its soo sad and gorgeous (i love it) and OMG in english i got a friggin 83 on the test he said we would all fail! i only got 3 wrong.. i was sooo proud of myself -- it really boosted my spirit baby, and i actually understand the math that he went over today (which confused me a lot at first) then i came home and talked to mom about my day and she was all happy to and she goes "Britty you want some lemonade" haha -- it was adorable :) and we're havin artichokes for dinner hehe makes me happy -- they are soooooooo goood -- i just dont kno what i'm gonna do tonite without friends or survivor -- they're both over :( uh get ready for crappy summer tv...ahh summer -- jules told me that we're goin down the shore thursday nite!! we'll have all friday, saturday, sunday, and monday baby -- im sad i have to miss a fellman party but there will be a ton more this summer (i love it)but it hit me today that my sister would be leaving soon, i dont get it fully yet how weird its gonna be.. but i think i'll miss her a lot -- i just hope she comes back here after she's done, i dont want her to like live out there (Pittsburgh) uh.. its gonna be strange -- Plus: because she's leavin her and my mom are having all this fights like "what are u gonna do party everynite?" and "why cant u let me go out tonite" which leads to deeper conversations and stuff.. then i get the "this goes for u too!" speech -- oh well.. i guess there tryin to make things easier by getting mad.. who knows.. well im off muah xox biotches ;)

anyway today was tough to get through cause i had to run in gym and i already wasnt feeling good (i stayed home sick yesterday)so when we were running my chest felt like it was on fire -- thats not really fun -- then i had to take an english test and i thought it was easy but of course (as my teacher said) the smartest kids get like 40's -- oh well im not gonna worry about it.. too much lol -- man i just cant wait for summer.. like i really really really cant wait.. woo hoo but im goin to the shore next weekend baby *yeah w/ kat,jules,coll,trix, and anna!! :)* -- and me and chell are working on a end of school year party -- sounds good to me :) anyway ladies i really have nothing else to write except... ttyl -- i'll hope i do good w/ updating it.. later biotches :)
